707050f-a.text:
Throop Avenue, north from Lorimer Street to Broadway. On the latter is the B. M. T. elevated and across it, at Boerum Street, is the Lincoln Savings Bank.
October 21, 1935
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
707050f-a.folder: Throop Ave. & Lorimer St., Brooklyn, NY

703340f-a.text:
Broadway at Lorimer Street, showing the "El" station, seen from Middletown Street.

September 25, 1941

P.L. Sperr
